Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements Customizable
The Order class represents an order of one or more pizzas and uniquely identified by an integer id.
Author:
Serena Zeng, Jackson Lee

    Order()
